payload.title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
payload.summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a 10% Vitamin C serum designed for Oily, Combination skin. It contains Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid and helps with brightening, fades dark spots.

usage.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.

safety.notes: Side effects: Mild tingling for sensitive skin. If irritation persists, consider reducing frequency or discontinuing use.
